function.name: AddVertex
function.desc: Adds the specified vertex to the element. You will have to call [pragma:ref]gui.Shape:Update[/pragma:ref] to apply the changes. The return value is the vertex index, which you can use for [pragma:ref]gui.Shape:SetVertexPos[/pragma:ref].

function.name: Update
function.desc: Needs to be called to apply any changes made to this element through [pragma:ref]gui.Shape:AddVertex[/pragma:ref], [pragma:ref]gui.Shape:SetVertexPos[/pragma:ref] or [pragma:ref]gui.Shape:ClearVertices[/pragma:ref].

function.name: SetVertexPos
function.desc: Changes the position of the specified vertex. You will have to call [pragma:ref]gui.Shape:Update[/pragma:ref] to apply the changes.

function.name: ClearVertices
function.desc: Removes all vertices from this element. You will have to call [pragma:ref]gui.Shape:Update[/pragma:ref] to apply the changes.

function.name: InvertVertexPositions
function.desc: Inverts all vertices on the specified axes (Or both axes if nothing is specified).
